data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Boldrini, R., Lima, L. R. C. (2017): New species and stages description of Ulmeritoides Traver, 1959 (Ephemeroptera: Leptophlebiidae) from Roraima State, Northern Brazil. Zootaxa 4282 (2): 385-394, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4282.2.11|12 occurrences
